title: Back-end Web Development Learning Plan
description: A comprehensive learning path designed for individuals aiming to become proficient in back-end web development. This plan covers server-side programming, databases, and API development to build robust and scalable web applications.

modules.title: Introduction to Back-end Development
modules.description: An overview of back-end development, understanding the server, client-server model, and the basics of web servers.

modules.title: Node.js and Express
modules.description: Learning to build server-side applications using Node.js and Express framework.

modules.title: Working with Databases
modules.description: Understanding relational and NoSQL databases, and integrating databases with back-end applications.

modules.title: Authentication & Security
modules.description: Implementing authentication, authorization, and learning best practices for securing back-end applications.

modules.title: API Development
modules.description: Designing and developing RESTful APIs and understanding GraphQL for more complex applications.

modules.title: Microservices Architecture
modules.description: Understanding the microservices architecture pattern and its advantages for building scalable applications.

outcome: By completing this learning plan, you will have the skills and knowledge to build secure, scalable back-end applications, understand database integration, and develop APIs for web services.
